name: Mirror Coat
description: When subject to a ranged attack, you can attempt to decrease the damage and send some back at the attacker in range. Using this reaction, the damage is decreased by 1d6 + MOVE. If this causes the damage to fall below zero, the attack is deflected and you may make a ranged attack roll to send it back at the attacker for 1d6 + MOVE psychic damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works great if the user goes last this turn.
